title: U.S. warns it will act on Syria if Security Council doesn't
text:
U.S. warns it will act on Syria if Security Council doesn't 12:34pm GMT - 01:07 
U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley says Washington ''remains prepared to act'' on Syria if the U.N. Security Council fails. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Ambassador Nikki Haley says Washington "remains prepared to act" on Syria if the U.N. Security Council fails. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2paZuSy
